item.description:
This world-renowned dance company will display their amazing body contortions, movements and sense of humor.

Outdoor performance, arrive early, it will get crowded!  There will be other Meetups there as well and we'll probably all link up.

Bring a blanket, snacks, etc.  Food and beverages including beer and wine will be available for purchase.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP

PARKING: Free at the Morgan St. Garage on the weekends.

http://www.riverfront.org/events/performances/#Pilobolus
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me. Also there's another Meetup that will have black & white balloons, I'll try to be near them.
item.name: Sat. 9/17 - Free outdoor performance by world-renowned dance troupe Pilobolus
